prompts: Create a small, furry Pokemon that has a bushy tail and sharp teeth.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and is known for its speed.
Design a Normal-type Pokemon with a round body and an orange color scheme.
Generate a creature that has distinctive whiskers and a playful personality.
Show me a Pokemon that excels in surprise attacks and has a mischievous nature.
Give me a speedy Pokemon that can easily navigate through grasslands and forests.
Make a Pokemon that has a unique blend of orange and white colors with a sleek appearance.
